description: Detects suspicious powershell download cradle using nslookup. This cradle uses nslookup to extract payloads from DNS records
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Nslookup PowerShell Download Cradle - ProcessCreation
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\nslookup.exe*) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"\nslookup.exe")) AND (process.parent.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-q\=txt\ * OR *\ \-querytype\=txt\ *)))
